mapper.insert: insert into orderList(orderId, receiverName, receiverPhone, prodNo, orderCount, orderDate, orderPrice, receiverPostCode, receiverRoadAddress, receiverDetailAddress, orderStatus) values(#{orderId}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhone}, #{prodNo}, #{orderCount}, #{orderDate}, #{orderPrice}, #{receiverPostCode}, #{receiverRoadAddress}, #{receiverDetailAddress}, #{orderStatus})
